About Me
  • Fan Hey there😊, I'm Xiaofan Shen. I graduated with a bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering from the University of Liverpool, and later switched gears to pursue a master's at UCL in Robotics and Computation. I have a deep passion for technology, and I particularly enjoy tinkering with Raspberry Pi to create fun and interesting projects.
    I have two dogs and one cat. I am located in both the UK and China. I love going on self-driving hikes and camping trips with my furry friends. I also have a passion for traveling, exploring the local customs of different countries and regions, and capturing stories through my camera lens.

    Education & Work

    🎓University College London, MSc Robotics & Computation
    🎓University of Liverpool, BEng Electrical Engineering
    💼Engineer, EMERSON Automation. Beijing, China. July 2020 to Aug. 2021
    💼Intern, Otong Electric Company. Shanghai, China. Jan. 2019 to May 2019
    💼Intern, Siemens Electrical Apparatus Ltd. Suzhou, China. Jan. 2018 to Mar. 2018

    Research Interests

    🤖Robotics
    🕶️Virtual Reality (VR)
    📊Image Processing
    🔍Search Algorithms
    🐍Python Programming
    ⚙️Machine Learning: k-Nearest Neighbors, kNN, Decision Tree, Support Vector Machine, Neural Network, Clustering
